moves.name: Quick Jab
moves.effect: A fast strike that has a chance to disarm the opponent.

moves.name: Heavy Strike
moves.effect: Deals extra damage but lowers the user's defense for 1 turn.

moves.name: Point Blank Shot
moves.effect: A close-range shot that has a higher chance for a critical hit.

moves.name: Ranged Precision
moves.effect: A precise shot with increased accuracy, bonus damage against distant enemies.

moves.name: Rapid Fire
moves.effect: Fires multiple shots at once, but each shot deals reduced damage.

moves.name: Dagger Sweep
moves.effect: A sweeping attack that hits multiple enemies in close range.

moves.name: Panic Shot
moves.effect: A psychological attack that causes the target to panic, reducing their next attack's effectiveness by 30%.

moves.name: Overwatch
moves.effect: The character prepares to intercept incoming attacks, increasing evasion by 50% for one turn.

moves.name: Smokescreen
moves.effect: Creates a smokescreen that provides all allies with a 20% chance to evade attacks for 2 turns.

moves.name: Flurry of Blows
moves.effect: A fast, multiple strike attack that lowers enemy defense by 1 for each successful hit.

moves.name: Throwing Knife
moves.effect: A precise thrown knife attack with increased critical hit chance if the target is unarmed.

moves.name: Uncover Weakness
moves.effect: Analyzes the enemy's posture and movement to exploit their weaknesses, lowering their chance to succeed in rolls by 15% for the next 3 turn.

moves.name: Dazzling Flash
moves.effect: Uses a flash to temporarily blind enemies, reducing their next attack accuracy by 50%.

moves.name: Sneak Attack
moves.effect: A surprise strike that deals extra damage if the target is unaware of the attacker.

moves.name: Adrenaline Surge
moves.effect: Sacrifices 1 Hit Point to gain an additional 1d3 for the next 3 turns.

moves.name: Vocal Manipulation
moves.effect: Uses verbal persuasion to confuse the enemy, lowering their accuracy by 20% for the next 3 turns.

moves.name: Bloodthirsty Frenzy
moves.effect: The user becomes more aggressive, dealing additional damage but taking 10% extra damage for the next turn.

moves.name: Berserk Charge
moves.effect: A powerful charging attack that stuns the enemy, making them unable to act for 1 turn.
